text: â€œPazuva rorusere anofanira kuuya namakwayana maviri amakondobwe nesheshe imwe chete, dzose dzine gore dzisina kuremara, pamwe chete nezvikamu zvitatu kubva mugumi zveefa14:10 marita angaita 6.5 zvoupfu hwakatsetseka hwakasanganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo nerogi14:10 0.3 yerita, uyewo nomundima 12, 15, 21 ne 24  imwe chete yamafuta.
